00027         protected function setCookies(PCPUserCredentials $userCredentials = NULL){
00028                 if ($this->usedUC === NULL){
00029                         $this->usedUC = $userCredentials;
00030                 }
00031                 
00032                 if(!$this->cookiesSet){
00033                         // workaround: setting cookies internally
00034                         $_SESSION['wsUserID'] = $this->usedUC->id;
00035                         $_SESSION['wsUserName'] = $this->usedUC->un;
00036                         $_SESSION['wsToken'] = $this->usedUC->lgToken;
00037 
00038                         global $wgUser;
00039                         $wgUser = User::newFromSession();
00040 
00041                         $this->cookiesSet = true;
00042                 }
00043 
00044         }

00046         public function login(PCPUserCredentials $userCredentials=NULL){
00047 
00048                 $__request = new FauxRequest(
00049                 PCPUtil::replaceInHash($this->lgQuery,
00050                 array($userCredentials->un,
00051                 $userCredentials->pwd)));
00052 //              var_dump($__request);
00053 //              die;
00054 //global $wgUser;
00055 //              $wgUser = new StubUser();
00056 //              var_dump($wgUser);
00057 //              die;
00058                 
00059                 $__api = new ApiMain($__request);
00060                 $__api->execute();
00061                 $__result =& $__api->GetResultData();
00062 
00063                 if ($__result['login']['result']!=="Success"){
00064                         return NULL;
00065                 }else{
00066                         $userCredentials->id = $__result['login']['lguserid'];
00067                         $userCredentials->pwd = ''; // remove the password
00068                         $userCredentials->lgToken = $__result['login']['lgtoken'];
00069 
00070                         $this->setCookies($userCredentials);
00071                 }
00072                 return $this->usedUC;
00073         }

00077

00085         public function getEditToken(PCPUserCredentials $userCredentials=NULL, $title=NULL){
00086                 $this->setCookies($userCredentials);
00087 
00088                 if($this->usedUC->editToken !== NULL){
00089                         return $this->usedUC->editToken;
00090                 }else{
00091                         if(!isset($title)){
00092                                 // try with Main Page
00093                                 $title="Main Page";
00094                         }
00095                         // extract only the first title
00096                         $title = PCPUtil::trimFirstTitle($title);
00097 
00098                         $__request = new FauxRequest(
00099                         PCPUtil::replaceInHash($this->queryEditToken,
00100                         array($title))
00101                         );
00102 
00103                         $__api = new ApiMain($__request);
00104                         $__api->execute();
00105                         $__result =& $__api->GetResultData();
00106 
00107                         if (!isset($__result['query']['pages'])){
00108                                 // error handling
00109                                 return NULL;
00110                         }else{
00111                                 // there could be more than one page in the result
00112                                 // each entry in the hashmap has the page ID as key
00113                                 foreach ($__result['query']['pages'] as $__pageid => $__pageObject){
00114                                         // get the page that has the matching title
00115                                         if ($__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['title'] === $title){
00116                                                 $this->usedUC->editToken = $__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['edittoken'];
00117                                                 $this->page->pageid=$__pageid;
00118                                                 $this->page->title=$__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['title'];
00119                                                 $this->page->lastrevid=$__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['lastrevid'];
00120                                                 $this->page->usedrevid=$__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['lastrevid'];
00121                                                 $this->page->basetimestamp=$__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['touched'];
00122                                                 $this->page->namespace=$__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['ns'];
00123                                         }
00124                                 }
00125 
00126                         }
00127                 }
00128                 return $this->usedUC->editToken;
00129         }

00131         public function createPage(PCPUserCredentials $userCredentials=NULL, $title=NULL, $text=NULL, $summary=NULL){
00132                 /*
00133                  * NOTE: MW (tested >= 1.12.x) has a problem using the MW API
00134                  * when the extension=php_domxml.dll in php.ini is enabled.
00135                  * more information: http://blog.airness.de/2008/08/28/mediawiki-problem-with-xampp-167/
00136                  * DATE: 2008-10-09
00137                  * AUTHOR: Dian
00138                  */
00139                 if($title == NULL){
00140                         // trigger an error?
00141                         return false;
00142                 }
00143                 $this->getEditToken($userCredentials, $title);
00144 
00145                 #var_dump($this);
00146 
00147                 $__request = new FauxRequest(
00148                 PCPUtil::replaceInHash($this->queryCreatePage,
00149                 array($title,$this->usedUC->editToken, $text, $summary))
00150                 );
00151 
00152                 $__api = new ApiMain($__request, true);
00153                 $__api->execute();
00154                 #$__result =& $__api->GetResultData();
00155                 return $__api->GetResultData();
00156         }

00166         public function &readPage(PCPUserCredentials $userCredentials=NULL, $title= NULL, $revisionID = NULL){
00167                 if($title == NULL){
00168                         // trigger an error?
00169                         #return NULL;
00170                         // handled by the MW API
00171                 }
00172 
00173                 $this->page = new PCPPage($title);
00174                 $this->setCookies($userCredentials);
00175 
00176                 // extract only the first title
00177                 $title = PCPUtil::trimFirstTitle($title);
00178 
00179                 $__request = new FauxRequest(
00180                 PCPUtil::replaceInHash($this->queryReadPage,
00181                 array($title))
00182                 );
00183                 
00184                 $__api = new ApiMain($__request, true);
00185 //              var_dump($this);
00186 //              die("readed");
00187                 $__api->execute();
00188                 
00189                 $__result =& $__api->GetResultData();
00190 
00191                 if (!isset($__result['query']['pages'])){
00192                         // error handling
00193                         print ("ERROR: Reading a single page failed".__FILE__);
00194                 }else{
00195                         // there could be more than one page in the result
00196                         // each entry in the hashmap has the page ID as key
00197                         foreach ($__result['query']['pages'] as $__pageid => $__pageObject){
00198                                 if ($__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['title'] === str_replace('_', ' ', $title)){
00199                                         // get the page that has the matching title
00200                                         if ($__pageid !== -1){
00201                                                 // the page exists
00202                                                 $this->page->pageid=$__pageid;
00203                                                 $this->page->title=$__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['title'];
00204                                                 $this->page->lastrevid=$__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['lastrevid'];
00205                                                 $this->page->basetimestamp=$__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['touched'];
00206                                                 $this->page->namespace=$__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['ns'];
00207 
00208                                                 if($revisionID !==NULL){
00209                                                         foreach ($__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['revisions'] as $__idx => $__revision){
00210                                                                 if($__revision['revid'] === $revisionID){
00211                                                                         $this->page->usedrevid = $revisionID;
00212                                                                         $this->page->text = $__revision['*'];
00213                                                                 }
00214                                                         }
00215                                                 }else{
00216                                                         #var_dump($__result);
00217                                                         $this->page->usedrevid = $__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['lastrevid'];
00218                                                         foreach ($__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['revisions'] as $__idx => $__revision){
00219                                                                 if($__revision['revid'] === $this->page->lastrevid){
00220                                                                         $this->page->text = $__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['revisions'][$__idx]['*'];
00221                                                                 }
00222                                                         }
00223                                                 }
00224                                         }else{
00225                                                 print ("WARNING: The page $title does not exist.");
00226                                         }
00227 
00228                                 }
00229                         }
00230                         return $this->page;
00231                 }
00232 
00233         }

00243         public function updatePage(PCPUserCredentials $userCredentials=NULL, $title=NULL, $text=NULL, $summary=NULL, $basetimestamp = NULL, $md5_hash = NULL){
00244                 /*
00245                  * NOTE: MW (tested >= 1.12.x) has a problem using the MW API
00246                  * when the extension=php_domxml.dll in php.ini is enabled.
00247                  * more information: http://blog.airness.de/2008/08/28/mediawiki-problem-with-xampp-167/
00248                  * DATE: 2008-10-09
00249                  * AUTHOR: Dian
00250                  */
00251                 if($title == NULL){
00252                         // trigger an error?
00253                         return false;
00254                 }
00255                 $this->getEditToken($userCredentials, $title);
00256 
00257 
00258                 // if md5 is not set, do not use it
00259                 if( $md5_hash !== NULL){
00260                         if ($basetimestamp === NULL)
00261                         {
00262                                 // $basetimestamp = $this->page->basetimestamp; // use the last revision
00263                                 unset($this->queryUpdatePage['basetimestamp']);
00264                                 $__request = new FauxRequest(
00265                                 PCPUtil::replaceInHash($this->queryUpdatePage,
00266                                 array($title,$this->usedUC->editToken, $text, $summary, $md5_hash ))
00267                                 );
00268                         }else{
00269                                 $__request = new FauxRequest(
00270                                 PCPUtil::replaceInHash($this->queryUpdatePage,
00271                                 array($title,$this->usedUC->editToken, $text, $summary, $basetimestamp,$md5_hash ))
00272                                 );
00273                         }
00274                 }else{
00275                         unset($this->queryUpdatePage['md5']);                   
00276                         if ($basetimestamp === NULL)
00277                         {
00278                                 // $basetimestamp = $this->page->basetimestamp;
00279                                 unset($this->queryUpdatePage['basetimestamp']);
00280                                 $__request = new FauxRequest(
00281                                 PCPUtil::replaceInHash($this->queryUpdatePage,
00282                                 array($title,$this->usedUC->editToken, $text, $summary))
00283                                 );
00284                         }else{
00285                                 $__request = new FauxRequest(
00286                                 PCPUtil::replaceInHash($this->queryUpdatePage,
00287                                 array($title,$this->usedUC->editToken, $text, $summary, $basetimestamp))
00288                                 );
00289                         }
00290 
00291                 }
00292 
00293                 $__api = new ApiMain($__request, true);
00294                 $__api->execute();
00295                 //              $__result =& $__api->GetResultData();
00296 
00297                 //              return true;
00298                 return $__api->GetResultData();
00299         }

00338         public function movePage(PCPUserCredentials $userCredentials=NULL, $fromTitle=NULL, $toTitle=NULL, $movetalk=false, $noredirect=false){
00339                 if($fromTitle == NULL || $toTitle == NULL){
00340                         // trigger an error?
00341                         return false;
00342                 }
00343                 $this->getEditToken($userCredentials, $fromTitle);
00344 
00345                 // if movetalk is not set, do not use it
00346                 if($movetalk){
00347                         $this->queryMovePage = array_merge($this->queryMovePage, array('movetalk'));
00348                 }
00349                 if($noredirect){
00350                         $this->queryMovePage = array_merge($this->queryMovePage, array('noredirect'));
00351                 }
00352 
00353                 $__request = new FauxRequest(
00354                 PCPUtil::replaceInHash($this->queryMovePage,
00355                 array($fromTitle, $toTitle, $this->usedUC->editToken))
00356                 );
00357 
00358                 $__api = new ApiMain($__request, true);
00359                 $__api->execute();
00360                 //              $__result =& $__api->GetResultData();
00361 
00362                 //              return true;
00363                 return $__api->GetResultData();
00364         }

00366         public function movePages(PCPUserCredentials $userCredentials=NULL, $fromTitles=NULL, $toTitles=NULL, $movetalks=false, $noredirects=false){
00367                 $__pages = array();
00368                 foreach ($fromTitles as $__title){
00369                         $__pages[$__title] = $this->movePage($userCredentials, $__title, $toTitles[$__title], $movetalks[$__title], $noredirects[$__title]);
00370                 }
00371                 return $__pages;
